EmailTemplate.description: IN USE Email sent to Grant Monitor when Project Officer submits Site Visit for approval
EmailTemplate.name: Site Visit Report Submitted
EmailTemplate.subject: Notification: Site Visit Report {!SiteVisit__c.Name} Submitted for Approval
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
This email is to notify you that Site Visit Report {!SiteVisit__c.Name} has been submitted and is ready for your review.
Please contact the Point of contact personnel listed above in order to discuss the next step associated with your submitted application
Sincerely,
EGMS Team
